description: Definition of the AWS::QuickSight::Theme Resource Type.

BorderStyle.description: The display options for tile borders for visuals.

Show.description: The option to enable display of borders for visuals.

DataColorPalette.description: The theme colors that are used for data colors in charts. The colors description is a hexadecimal color code that consists of six alphanumerical characters, prefixed with #, for example #37BFF5.

EmptyFillColor.description: The hexadecimal code of a color that applies to charts where a lack of data is highlighted.

MinMaxGradient.description: The minimum and maximum hexadecimal codes that describe a color gradient.

GutterStyle.description: The display options for gutter spacing between tiles on a sheet.

Show.description: This Boolean value controls whether to display a gutter space between sheet tiles.

MarginStyle.description: The display options for margins around the outside edge of sheets.

Show.description: This Boolean value controls whether to display sheet margins.

Actions.description: The IAM action to grant or revoke permissions on.

Principal.description:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the principal. This can be one of the following:

  • The ARN of an Amazon QuickSight user or group associated with a data source or dataset. (This is common.)

  • The ARN of an Amazon QuickSight user, group, or namespace associated with an analysis, dashboard, template, or theme. (This is common.)

  • The ARN of an AWS account root: This is an IAM ARN rather than a QuickSight ARN. Use this option only to share resources (templates) across AWS accounts. (This is less common.)

Tag.description: The key or keys of the key-value pairs for the resource tag or tags assigned to the resource.

ThemeConfiguration.description: The theme configuration. This configuration contains all of the display properties for a theme.

CreatedTime.description: The date and time that this theme version was created.

BaseThemeId.description: The Amazon QuickSight-defined ID of the theme that a custom theme inherits from. All themes initially inherit from a default QuickSight theme.

Arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource.

TileLayoutStyle.description: The display options for the layout of tiles on a sheet.

TileStyle.description: Display options related to tiles on a sheet.

UIColorPalette.description: The theme colors that apply to UI and to charts, excluding data colors. The colors description is a hexadecimal color code that consists of six alphanumerical characters, prefixed with #, for example #37BFF5. For more information, see Using Themes in Amazon QuickSight in the Amazon QuickSight User Guide.

Warning.description: This color that applies to warning and informational messages.

Accent.description: This color is that applies to selected states and buttons.

AccentForeground.description: The foreground color that applies to any text or other elements that appear over the accent color.

SecondaryBackground.description: The background color that applies to the sheet background and sheet controls.

DangerForeground.description: The foreground color that applies to any text or other elements that appear over the error color.

PrimaryBackground.description: The background color that applies to visuals and other high emphasis UI.

Dimension.description: The color that applies to the names of fields that are identified as dimensions.

SecondaryForeground.description: The foreground color that applies to any sheet title, sheet control text, or UI that appears over the secondary background.

WarningForeground.description: The foreground color that applies to any text or other elements that appear over the warning color.

DimensionForeground.description: The foreground color that applies to any text or other elements that appear over the dimension color.

PrimaryForeground.description: The color of text and other foreground elements that appear over the primary background regions, such as grid lines, borders, table banding, icons, and so on.

Success.description: The color that applies to success messages, for example the check mark for a successful download.

Danger.description: The color that applies to error messages.

SuccessForeground.description: The foreground color that applies to any text or other elements that appear over the success color.

Measure.description: The color that applies to the names of fields that are identified as measures.

MeasureForeground.description: The foreground color that applies to any text or other elements that appear over the measure color.

Arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the theme.

BaseThemeId.description: The ID of the theme that a custom theme will inherit from. All themes inherit from one of the starting themes defined by Amazon QuickSight. For a list of the starting themes, use ListThemes or choose Themes from within a QuickSight analysis.

CreatedTime.description: The date and time that the theme was created.

LastUpdatedTime.description: The date and time that the theme was last updated.

Permissions.description: A valid grouping of resource permissions to apply to the new theme.

Tags.description: A map of the key-value pairs for the resource tag or tags that you want to add to the resource.

VersionDescription.description: A description of the first version of the theme that you're creating. Every time UpdateTheme is called, a new version is created. Each version of the theme has a description of the version in the VersionDescription field.
